Name: De Spiegel
Review Text: The waiter Tim is a legend, best service ever. He was really welcoming and helpful with us in our trip to Amsterdam. We definitely recommend and we'll be back only if he's working!

Name: De Spiegel
Review Text: Great food, cozy place in the center, awesome to eat outside with the nice canal and the sun! Really nice staff.

Name: De Spiegel

Name: De Spiegel
Review Text: Nicy, cosy, authentic Dutch place. If uou are craving the classic dutch breakfast or lunches, this is the place to go. Super staff!

Name: De Spiegel

Name: De Spiegel
Review Text: Location and food I had no issues with, but the older server who works here has a terrible attitude and was incredibly rude. This was my last stop whilst in Amsterdam and thanks to this server I will probably not visit this cafe nor the city ever again.

Name: De Spiegel
Review Text: Sunny terrace and great service. Especially tim is a very nice waiter

Name: De Spiegel

Name: De Spiegel
Review Text: Beer was nice and the staff was friendly, but the food was not good at all. We ordered pancakes, both were undercooked (very doughy) and my friends pancake literally had 2 slices of cheese and a piece of ham thrown on it. For 10 euro per meal it was way too much for what we got.

Name: De Spiegel
Review Text: A caf√© garden: tight, tables very close together, but tasty food. Nice and quick service. Choice of dishes perfect for a quick lunch. Very good coffee.

Name: De Spiegel
Review Text: Great food and excellent service. Beautiful interior and patio.

Name: De Spiegel
Review Text: Acceptable location for basic lunch food. Good location, fast service. Food is ok but without any passion. We ordered three different salads, all looked exactly the same except tuna, goat cheese or salmon.

Name: De Spiegel
Review Text: We ordered a mozarella sandwich and banana pancake. Both were excellent especially the pancake. The pancakes were huge. It was quite an effort to finish both. But highly recommended. Friendly staff.

Name: De Spiegel
Review Text: Great selection of beers and great service. Lovely patio. One of the best pubs in Amsterdam!

Name: De Spiegel
Review Text: Very Rude and absolutely bad hospitality gesture. Their intention was to force us ordering food and beer from their shop even if you don't like their venue..bad experience for tourists. Thanks to other nearby restaurant to accommodate our request

Name: De Spiegel

Name: De Spiegel
